nodes.text: "The Heroes of Rogue One" is the sixteenth booklet in a series of canon reference booklets titled the Star Wars Encyclopedia and was published on February 16, 2021.

The heroes of Rogue One were a spark of hope for the Rebellion when all seemed lost. Made up of members of the Special Forces Tracker Group, these courageous rebel soldiers ignored orders from the Alliance High Command, to follow the steadfast leadership of Jyn Erso and Cassian Andor. Sadly, everyone who took part in the secret attack mission lost their lives in the Battle of Scarif. However, despite the tragic outcome, they achieved their main objective: to steal the Death Star blueprints and hand them over to the Alliance commanders, who then used them to detect the rift in the monstrous space station and prepare a daring offensive to destroy it. Rogue One's sacrifice will not have been in vain.
